title: Rhythm Clocks "Marble Stars" Magic Clock Motion
features: This timepiece is a state of the art creation surrounded by a beautiful burl wood colored frame with a silver accented face
Every hour this state of the art creation plays one of 30 different melodies, including 12 popular melodies, 12 classic melodies or 6 Christmas melodies for you to enjoy
Every hour this state of the art creation plays one of 30 different melodies, including 12 popular melodies, 12 classic melodies or 6 Christmas melodies for you to enjoy
Optional volume control, On/Off switch and display button lets you silence your clock on demand, while it still keeps perfect time
Clock measures 18. 8” high by 18. 7” wide and 6” deep and operates on two D batteries that are included to help keep the clocks precision Quartz movement
description: Manufactured by Rhythm Clocks, the Marble Stars is constructed of a plastic frame, which looks like wood. On the hour, the dial opens and splits into three sections, revealing five silver bells. The beautiful, faux burl wood-colored frame, along with the crystals and silver-colored accents, make this clock a truly elegant addition to any home. Clock is battery quartz operated. Manufacturer warranties this clock for one year
